body.name: SHAPERMINT Sports Bras for Women - Sports Bra - Womens Workout Tops - Wireless Bra
features: HIGH LEVEL SUPPORT: This wireless bra is designed for maximum comfort and flexibility. Crafted from a lightweight blend of nylon and spandex, this sport bra is perfect for any activity - from running errands and going to work to lounging around

INNOVATIVE DESIGN: Enjoy the day without a care in the new comfortable bras for women. Its stay-in-place band and racerback design offer a snug fit, while a scoop neck and thick shoulder straps provide extra coverage

REMOVABLE CUPS: Customize your support and coverage with the removable cups of the new from small to plus size sports bras for women. Wear it your way and stay supported and comfortable all day, every day

STRETCH AND SMOOTHING BRA: Feel free to move without restrictions thanks to the comfy bra. It provides the perfect balance of stretch and smoothing, with its wire-free design, wide waistband, and racerback straps that won't slip

CONFIDENCE BOOST FOR EVERY BODY: With a wide range of sizes, everyone has access to a confidence-boosting bra that allows you to stretch and move comfortably. Wear confidence everywhere you go with the only confidence boost you need every day

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #1,112 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #12 in Women's Sports Bras

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sports Bra
reviews.reviewText: This is the most comfortable and supportive sports bra I’ve tried. I wear a 40 DDD in regular bras and purchased a XXL. It fits great, provides excellent coverage and is surprisingly supportive. The fabric is also very soft and comfortable against my skin; I hope it stays that way after I wash it. I am not a high impact exerciser and I’m not sure it would be great for running, thought it passed the ‘jumping test; with flying colors. It will be perfect for my Pilates and yoga classes, and for bricks walks with the dog.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best sports bra I’ve ever had
reviews.reviewText: So soft. So comfortable. So supportive. Everything about the design is perfect. Not only could you work all day and not even notice you’re in a sports bra, you can peacefully sleep with it on too. It doesn’t slide up. It keeps them in place. It doesn’t dig into your armpits or back. It is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great lounging bra
reviews.reviewText: For those with larger breasts, this bra is quite comfortable for hanging out at home, going to the store, etc. I would not consider this a sports bra as the girls bounce with light activity. Perhaps for yoga, stationary biking, and weight lifting it would do just fine. But speed walking and anything higher this bra is not supportive. For that I took off a star. Also, the size chart is off in my opinion. On the chart I should purchase a 2XL. Since I like a tighter fit, I ordered an XL. This one is very loose, but I liked the full coverage for the breasts so I kept it for lazy home days. On occasion, I do need to move the girls back up because the band is pretty loose.Because I liked the coverage, I purchased another one, but this time a Large. This one fits much better for support without the girls falling out the bottom. So if you are looking for something closer to a sports bra fit, I would consider sizing down a couple sizes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy medium-high support bra
reviews.reviewText: I wear a 40F/G and ordered a 3X. It fits comfortably and doesn’t make me feel too restricted while providing the support I need to exercise. I do spin classes and this is my go-to! I don’t think this bra would provide the support I need for something like running without potentially sizing down. But for machines/spin it works well. It’s also pretty soft/not itchy and washes well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great fabric, support, feel and material. Bummer is the band is wide, and kept rolling up when I sat my plus size down. Made it a little sore at first. Almost perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable & supportive bra for big boobs
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I wear a size 42 H & I need a supportive sports bra when I work & workout. This bra is super comfortable, supportive & keeps the girls in. It is also easy to take off especially when your sweaty. Easy to clean too & the pads can come out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Athleisure Bra!
reviews.reviewText: This is a SUPER comfortable sports bra. I was actually able to keep the cups in while wearing this bra. It's very flattering and doesn't do the uniboob situation. I usually wear a 38I and purchased a 3X. No spillage or riding up in the back. Soft and supportive. The cost seems like a lot for a regular sports bra, but I wouldn't really consider it to be just that. Totally worth the buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Tight and comfy
reviews.reviewText: Don't use the size chart that it presents first. It said I was an XL but woth swimsuits I started going back down to a medium. So there is a second color coded chart that is more accurate. It is a tight fit for my floppy mom boobs. You can definitely feel the compression but I needed a tight fit around the waist so the ladies didn't pop out below. Overall I am happy with it. I may try a size above for lounging but the medium for 34DD is great for exercising in. The shoulder starps could be longer tho. It gets my shoulders after a while.
Their sizing chart does run large. I am a 34 DD in any bra I buy, but their L was too big. The M was just perfect for me, not extremely tight but still very supportive.

reviews.reviewTitle: comfortable - fits well - doesn't need the pads
reviews.reviewText: I like the colour (bought the heather gray with black trim) - matches everything I own. The soft material is so nice. The bra stays in place pretty well - bottom elastic moves a bit - but don't they all?? I am happy - considering a second one.
Fits well. I just wish it offered about 25% more support. Otherwise very comfortable.

I have spent a long time trying to find a comfortable jog bra. I don't need one for fitness. I need a jog bra because I have severe chronic sciatica and I am no longer able to put my arms behind me without causing pain in my lower body (who knew?). I found front closure bras uncomfortable with the wire poking me.I've bought many jog bras. Found one but it's no longer being made. Took a chance on this and OMG, it's fantastic. i love it. It's comfortable, washes well and moves with me. I'm about the buy another one and hope to buy another color after that. I highly recommend this product.

Checked their size chart. They advised medium. I ordered large. So small I could barely get it on. Have returned and have ordered extra large. Never have needed any bigger than large in any other brand.
